name: Curling One
summary: Curling One allows you to experience the sport of curling, from delivery and sweeping to detailed strategic planning and execution, in a fascinating 3D world.  The advanced physics engine produces realistic curl, effective sweeping functionality, and accurate impact results.  All of the basic curling rules are implemented, including the five-rock rule (free guard zone), hog line violations, and removal of out-of-bounds stones.  Play against an AI opponent, or with friends in pass-and-play...
